bubble features
==============================================================================

|bubble_logo|

`bubble`_ is :term:`cli` based tool for creating and maintaining api 2 api connections.

This project provides tutorials and examples how to configure bubble to act as your connection.

Bubble project is :term:`BDD` tested with `behave`_.
Currently this project documentation is very loosly based on the `behave.example`_.
